item.title: Special-Price EP950-60 EP950-60"GL Coated Black
item.description:
">
EP950-60

PORTABLE BUFFET SERIES SNEEZEGUARD STRUCTURE: 1" & 1-1/2" (round) Black powder coated structures with brushed stainless steel accents.

Structure includes: 1/4" Clear Plexi-Glass face panel with rounded corners, polished exposed edges, revolving face panel, telescoping height adjustment, and is fully detailed and packaged for UPS shipment.


Manufacturer: 
Model #: EP950-60"GL
Price: $340.00
